column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Tan - Thank you very much for the update. We really appreciate your giving us another chance
column2: and for granting us another star. We often suggest the Tonkotsu White or Tonkotsu Assari since these respective broths offer a much lighter profile than the Tonkotsu Black. And we also appreciate your maneuvering around our peak-rush hour traffic. Our primary goal has and always will be to maintain consistent quality and service to continue earning your business. On behalf of everyone at JINYA-Midtown: Thank you.
